verbs.description: [ARG1: The Jerry Brown - Donald Trump saga over his National Guard stunt] [V: continues] , [ARGM-ADV: sorta] . According to the Washington Post , the Pentagon and Department of Homeland Security ( DHS ) have agreed to Brown ’s terms on sending the National Guard to the border ....
